-- DATA SOURCE

INSERT INTO [CONFIGURATION].[DATASOURCES] (PipelineType, ConnectorType, FetchFrequency, DataSource, SourcePath, SourceName, SourceExtension, Separator)
VALUES ('API', 'REST-ANONYMOUS-GET', 'daily', 'YahooFinance', 'https://query1.finance.yahoo.com/v7/finance/download/GBPEUR=X?period1=1640995200&period2=1670371200&interval=1d&events=history&includeAdjustedClose=true', 'GBP_EURO', 'csv', ',') 

DROP TABLE [CONFIGURATION].[DATASOURCES]

DELETE FROM [CONFIGURATION].[DATASOURCES]
